entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries this evening. A few flurries beginning late this evening and ending before morning. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 31 March 2023
